main event: A witness observed a bright light in the sky over Bethlehem, Pennsylvania for approximately 30 minutes on January 8, 1967.
interesting points: The object was estimated to be about 10 feet in diameter., The sighting occurred around 0410 hours., The UFO report was associated with Project Blue Book, which investigated UFO sightings., The witness was an amateur astronomer who provided a detailed account of the observation., There was confusion about astronomical objects in the sky during the time of the sighting.
sighted object: a bright light in the sky
witness description: an amateur astronomer studying weather conditions
